Description

Omnerod is a Progressive Metal band based in Brussels, BE.

History

Omnerod is a Progressive Metal band from Brussels created in December 2009. After many line-up changes, it is now driven by the tenacity and imagination of Romain Jeuniaux (Guitar and vocals), Pablo Schwilden (Drums), Anthony Deneyer (Guitar and vocals) and André Six (Bass).

Influenced by many amazing Progressive Metal bands and artists (Opeth, Between the Buried and Me, Leprous, Devin Townsend), as well as musical sources from other various genres, the band released its first album, Ivory Dune, in 2014. The second album, named Arteries and released in 2019, announces a new beginning for the band. Thanks to André and Anthony, the band finally has a complete line-up and will bring their unique universe to life in concert.
